Welcome to python-restclient’s documentation!¶

Everything you need to know about py-restclient.

Py-restclient is simple REST client for Python, inspired bythe microframework (Camping, Sinatra) style of specifying actions: get,headput, post, delete.

Made by Enki Multimedia for one of our project and we decided to make it public.

  • Installation
  • Requirements
  • Getting Started
    • Perform HTTP call support with restclient.rest.Resource.
    • Perform HTTP call support with restclient.rest.RestClient.
